title: China Is Accelerating Its Nuclear Buildup Over Rising Fears of U.S. Conflict - The Wall Street Journal

description: China has accelerated an expansion of its nuclear arsenal because of a change in its assessment of the threat posed by the U.S., people with knowledge of the Chinese leadershipâ€™s thinking say.
